thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sierra Wireless Q4 Loss Per Share $0.11

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sierra Wireless Q4 Loss Per Share $0.11
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Sierra Wireless Inc:
* SIERRA WIRELESS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.10 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.11 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $181 MILLION TO $189 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 12.6 PERCENT TO $183.5 MILLION * QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * ‍TARGETING A QUARTERLY NON-GAAP OPERATING EXPENSE RUN RATE OF $56.5 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2018​
* EXPECT Q1 OF 2018 TO BE IMPACTED BY SOME UNUSUAL AND MAINLY NON-RECURRING ITEMS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.25, REVENUE VIEW $177.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
